name: professional-guidance-app
description: 智能专业选择指导应用 - AI驱动的专业发展助手
author: Professional App Team

scripts.start:local: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run open:web"
scripts.start:backend: echo '启动后端服务...' && (cd backend/user-service && python src/main.py > /tmp/user-service.log 2>&1 &) && (cd backend/chat-service && python src/main.py > /tmp/chat-service.log 2>&1 &) && sleep 2 && echo '后端服务已启动 (端口: 8001, 8003)'
scripts.start:frontend: echo '启动前端...' && (cd frontend/web && npm run dev > /tmp/frontend.log 2>&1 &) && sleep 3 && echo '前端已启动'
scripts.open:web: echo '打开浏览器...' && sleep 3 && open http://localhost:3000
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:mobile
scripts.ci:check: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.ci:test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
